## GridTools.MultiGridViewProps interface

Props for the MultiGridView component. Container for multiple grid instances with shared context and batch operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface MultiGridViewProps extends ViewBaseProps 
```
**Extends:** [ViewBaseProps](./ts-res-ui-components.viewstatetools.viewbaseprops.md)
